'''''The Distance of the Moon''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VIII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must perform 11 [[Plunging Attack]]s in one Gravity Reduction Field and hit the [[Prototype Cal. Breguet]].
